name: Earth Defender (itch) (badmuggames)
description:
Protect the humankind and the Earth against the evil alien invasion. You control the spaceship with laser cannon and the aim is to smash all enemies wave by wave.

CONTROLS

LEFT ARROW, RIGHT ARROW     Player movement
SPACE              Fire
1 2 3                   Change player's ship
S                           Sound On/Off
P                           Pause game
T                           Screenshot mode
F                           Show Fps
L                           Enable Dynamic Starfield
[ ]                         Starfield Brightness
< >                         Add/Remove starfield layer
